articles.author: Ruth Carson, Matthew Burgess
articles.title: Global Bond Yields Hit 16-Year High on Fading Rate-Cut Bets - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Global bond yields have risen to highs last seen in 2009 ahead of a key Federal Reserve policy meeting, signaling concerns that interest-rate cutting cycles from the US to Australia may be ending soon.
articles.content: Global bond yields have risen to highs last seen in 2009 ahead of a key Federal Reserve policy meeting, signaling concerns that interest-rate cutting cycles from the US to Australia may be ending soo… [+346 chars]
